snippet: The pared-down look and no-nonsense sensibility of “The Early Show” demonstrates how far it trails “Today” and “Good Morning America” in ratings. It’s also a sign of how weakness can become a strength.
lead_paragraph: The pared-down look and no-nonsense sensibility of “The Early Show” demonstrates how far it trails “Today” and “Good Morning America” in ratings. It’s also a sign of how weakness can become a strength.

headline.main: Mornings Are Sober but Better at CBS
headline.print_headline: Mornings Are Sober But Better At CBS
headline.seo: ‘The Early Show’ on CBS Is Sober but Stronger
